page.title: 18The Entertainment Society
page.content: The Entertainment Society has been in existance for 21 years. This is an amateur organisation. The society does 3 shows a year. In January,after Christmas, there is a pantomime, which this year was "Cinderella".The show in the summer this year was an Old Time Music Hall. In the autumn, they sometimes do a play or a musical. Last year it was a play called "Big Bad Mouse", this year, it is the musical "Grease" . The money that they make keeps the society going through the year. Funds are also raised by having fetes and jumble sales. The three shows are staged in the Civic Hall with full costume, lighting, sound and orchestra. The hall can seat 200 people for each performance.
